content: Screenshot-from-2020-10-26-22-08-17.png I'm working on an English/French site upgrade from Drupal 7. Has anyone else noticed that the language switcher doesn't display the language name in the native language? It does that in D7 where it's "Français" but in Backdrop it says "French". Need an option to translate the name as well. But it can't be with locale since we actually want it translated on the English side and on the French side it should say "English". Clear as mud?
I see now... D7 (via i18n?) has an extra field in the language settings: Native language name. Screenshot-from-2020-10-26-22-19-14.png
For now I can just change the main Language name. I don't think that'll be a problem
Yes, I noticed that, too. That solution is probably okay for many cases.
